1249000.name: Mýrdalssandur, Iceland VR Compatibility DLC
1249000.description:
Explore the world with an extra layer of immersion, accompanied by some additional VR exclusive screenshot mechanics. Capture your unique perspective using motion tracking to form creative shooting angles and compositions. I also put a lot of time into optimising the game for VR and building on the VR mechanics from the Fushimi Inari game, so it should be a smooth experience on most headsets.

Also exclusively for oculus headsets - Additional lifelike DSLR shooting mechanics with zoom and depth of field effects.
